message: Hi Bob, I have a fantastic product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
Hi Alice, thank you for offering the product. I'm interested, but I can only pay up to $120.
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $165.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I'm still looking to keep my expenses down. Would $150 be within your range?
